        Parameters:
        site - the site.
        Returns:
        the files.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs.

      • getPath

        public static String getPath(FileSystemEntity fse,
                             LocaleContext lc)
        Get the path using the root directory name from getRootDirectoryName(DirectoryEntity, LocaleContext).
        Parameters:
        fse - the file.
        lc - the locale context.
        Returns:
        the path.

      • getRootDirectoryName

        public static String getRootDirectoryName(DirectoryEntity root,
                                          LocaleContext lc)
        Get the root directory name for the specified directory. This is used to convert site associated directory names into something more user friendly.
        Parameters:
        root - the root.
        lc - the locale context.
        Returns:
        the root name. If not a root directory, the name of the directory is returned.

      • getRootDirectoryName

        public static String getRootDirectoryName(String rootPath,
                                          LocaleContext lc)
        Get the root directory name for the specified root path. This is used to convert site associated directory names into something more user friendly.
        Parameters:
        rootPath - the root.
        lc - the locale context.
        Returns:
        the root name. If not a root directory, the original path is returned.

      • getSiteFromPath

        public static CmsSite getSiteFromPath(String filePath)
        Get Site from the file path.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the file path.
        Returns:
        the site or null.

      • getSiteSpecificRootDirectoryFromPath

        public static DirectoryEntity getSiteSpecificRootDirectoryFromPath(String filePath)
        Get the special root directory from the file path. It's expected that the file path starts with a specially named path like "SITE1", etc. For general purpose path lookup use FileSystemUtil.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the file path.
        Returns:
        the directory or null.

        Returns:
        the files.
        Throws:
